name: accession_formats
description: Tests validation of biological database accession formats
notes: S003 has multiple invalid accessions: invalid_acc, SRR123 (too short), PRJNA999 (too short), ABC, not_a_gene
S006 has lowercase accessions - case should be standardized
Valid formats: SAMN/SAME/SAMD for BioSample, SRR/ERR/DRR for SRA runs
Valid RefSeq prefixes: NM_, NC_, XM_, NR_, XR_, WP_, YP_
